title.text: A majority of the public says premarital sex is at least sometimes acceptable % saying they personally think each of the following is acceptable, regardless of whether they would do it themselves

values: Sex between unmarried adults in a committed relationship
Casual sex between consenting adults not in a committed relationship
Consenting adults exchanging explicit images of themselves
